pageDescription: We connect people that recovered from Covid-19 and thus probably immune helpers with all those who need support
joinLaneOfferHelp: I want to become an immune hero
dpAgreementText: Ich habe die Datenschutzerklärung verstanden und möchte informiert, wenn es in meiner Nähe Möglichkeiten gibt zu helfen.
introTitle: Ich bin immun, was kann ich tun?
introDescription:
Du hast die COVID-19-Erkrankung schon hinter dir und möchtest dich nun gesellschaftlich engagieren?

Dann mach mit und werde Immunheld:in! Wir informieren Dich, wenn es in Deiner Region Möglichkeiten gibt zu helfen.
verify/spam-protection: A verification email has been sent already.
auth/email-already-in-use: The email address is already in use.
loginScreen_verify_subtitle: You will need to verify your email to complete registration
loginScreen_verify_body: An email has been sent to {email} with a link to verify your account. If you have not received the email after a few minutes, please check your spam folder.
404_body: Ooops ... The page you are looking for could not be found
